item.title: Monitoring & Control: Schedule
item.description: Project Schedule Plan your project using the project schedule. Create Your Project Plan Use a work breakdown structure to organise individual tasks using parent and child relationships. Get Started » Drag And Drop Utilise Drag and Drop functionality to easily reorder and structure your tasks. Get Started » Task Dependencies Maintain critical task dependencies within your project plan. Get Started » Add Task Notes Record additional information for each project task.
